Verses: 1 janangalukkul Anegarum Avargaludaiya Sthreegalum Yoodharaagiya Thangal Sagodhararmel Muraiyidugira Periya Kookkuralundaayitru.
2 adhennavendraal, Avargalil Silar Naangal Engal Kumaararodum Engal Kumaaraththigalodum Anegaraanapadiyinaal, Saappittup Pizhaikkumpadikku Naangal Dhaaniyaththaik Kadanaaga Vaanginom Endraargal.
3 veru Silar Engal Nilangalaiyum Engal Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum Engal Veedugalaiyum Naangal Adaimaanamaaga Vaiththu, Indhap Panjaththile Dhaaniyam Vaanginom Endraargal.
4 innum Silar Raajaavukkuth Theervaiseluththa, Naangal Engal Nilangalmelum Engal Dhraatchaththottangalmelum, Panaththaik Kadanaaga Vaanginom Endrum;

5 engal Udalum Engal Sagodharar Udalum Sari; Engal Pillaigalum Avargal Pillaigalum Sari; Aanaalum, Idho, Naangal Engal Kumaararaiyum Engal Kumaaraththigalaiyum Adimaiththanaththirku Utpaduththavendiyadhaayirukkiradhu; Appadiye Engal Kumaaraththigalil Silar Adimaippattumirukkiraargal; Avargalai Meetka Engalukku Nirvaagamillai; Engal Nilangalum Engal Dhraatchaththottangalum Vere Manidhar Kaivasamaayitru Endraargal.
6 avargal Kookkuralaiyum, Indhavaarththaigalaiyum Naan Kettapodhu, Migavum Kobankondu,

7 en Manadhile Aalosanaipanni, Pirpaadu Prabukkalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Kadindhukondu: Neengal Avaravar Thangal Sagodhararmel En Vatti Sumaththugireergal Endru Solli, Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Oru Periya Sabaikoodivarachcheydhu,

8 avargalai Nokki: Purajaadhiyaarukku Virkappatta Yoodharaagiya Engal Sagodhararai Naangal Engal Sakthikkuththakkadhaai Meettirukkaiyil, Neengal Thirumba Ungal Sagodhararai Virkalaamaa? Ivargal Namakku Vilaippattuppogalaamaa Endren; Appozhudhu Avargal Maru Uththaravu Solla Idamillaamal Mavunamaayirundhaargal.
9 pinnum Naan Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Seygira Kaariyam Nalladhalla; Nammudaiya Pagaignaraagiya Purajaadhiyaar Nindhikkiradhinimiththam Neengal Nammudaiya Dhevanukku Bayandhu Nadakkavendaamaa?
10 naanum En Sagodhararum En Velaikkaararum Ivvidhamaagavaa Avargalukkup Panamum Dhaaniyamum Kadankoduththirukkirom? Indha Vattiyai Vittuviduvomaaga.

11 neengal Indraikku Avargal Nilangalaiyum, Avargal Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum, Avargal Olivaththoppugalaiyum, Avargal Veedugalaiyum, Neengal Panaththilum Dhaaniyaththilum Dhraatcharasaththilum Enneyilum Nootrukkondru Veedhamaaga Avargalidaththil Dhandivarugira Vattiyaiyum, Avargalukkuth Thirumbakkoduththuvidungal Endren.

12 adharku Avargal Naangal Adhaith Thirumbak Koduththuvittu, Ini Appadi Avargalidaththil Ketkamaattom; Neer Sollugirapadiye Seyvom Endraargal; Appozhudhu Naan Aasaariyargalai Azhaiththu, Avargal Indha Vaarththaiyinpadi Seyya Avargalai Aanaiyiduviththukkonden.

13 naan En Vasthiraththai Udharippottu, Ippadi Indha Vaarththaiyai Niraivetraadha Endha Manidhanaiyum Avan Veettilum Avan Sambaaththiyaththilum Irundhu Dhevan Udharippodakkadavar; Indhappragaaramaaga Avan Udharippodappattu, Verumaiyaaip Povaanaaga Endren; Adharku Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Aamen Endru Solli Karththaraith Thudhiththaargal; Pinbu Janangal Indha Vaarththaiyinpadiye Seydhaargal.

14 naan Yoodhaadhesaththile Adhipadhiyaayirukkumpadi Raajaavaagiya Ardhasashtaa Enakkuk Karpiththa Naalaagiya Avarudaiya Irubadhaam Varusham Thodangi, Avarudaiya Muppaththirandaam Varusham Varaikkum Irundha Pannirandu Varushakaalamaai, Naanum En Sagodhararum Adhipadhigal Vaangugira Padiyai Vaangi Saappidavillai.

15 enakku Munnirundha Adhipadhigal Janangalukku Baaramaayirundhu, Avargal Kaiyile Appamum Dhraatcharasamum Vaanginadhum Allaamal, Naarpadhusekkal Velliyum Vaangivandhaargal; Avargal Velaikkaarar Mudhalaai Janangalmel Adhigaaram Seluththinaargal; Naano Dhevanukku Bayandhadhinaal Ippadi Seyyavillai.
16 oru Vayalaiyaavadhu Naangal Kollavillai; Andha Alangaththin Velaiyile Muyandru Nindren; En Velaikkaararanaivarum Koottamaai Andha Velaikkuk Koodivandhaargal.
17 yoodharum Moopparumaana Nootraimbadhuperum, Engalai Sutrilumirukkira Purajaadhigalidaththilirundhu Engalidaththirku Vandhavargalum En Pandhiyil Saappittaargal.

18 naalondrukku Oru Kaalaiyum, Mudhal Tharamaana Aaru Aadum Samaikkappattadhu; Patchigalum Samaikkappattadhu; Paththunaalaikku Orudharam Naanaavidha Dhraatcharasamum Selavazhindhadhu. Ippadiyellaam Irundhapodhum, Indha Janangal Pattapaadu Kadinamaayirundhapadiyaal, Adhipadhigal Vaangugira Padiyai Naan Vaangavillai.
19 en Dhevane, Naan Indha Janaththukkaaga Seydha Ellaavatrinpadiyum Enakku Nanmaiyundaaga Ennai Ninaiththarulum.
